HandRank - Class in pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.model
Represents a hand ranking in poker, consisting of the hand's type (e.g., STRAIGHT_FLUSH) and a list of kickers (additional cards used for comparison in case of ties).

HandType - Enum Class in pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.model
Enum representing the different types of poker hands, ordered by their rank (highest to lowest).
